page.title: 17Occupations and Pursuits
page.content: Many people are self-employed within the area. Their skills range from gloving to upholstery and cabinet making. Local industry within our area encompasses picture framing, drainage specialists, garage services, hotel and pubs and furniture renovation. Security patrolling, music lessons and jewellery making are also represented. Country pursuits include fishing, shooting and hunting. Many competent riders and show jumpers live in the area, as well as working-dog owners and handlers. Ferrets and lurchers are also worked. The children all learn folk and country dancing, and the boys also do Morris dancing. The W.I. and W.R.V.S. are the focal points for handicrafts and cooking.
